title: Best VR Experience Award
description: Won first place for innovative VR training simulation that reduced onboarding time by 60%. Featured in VentureBeat and recognized for pushing boundaries in enterprise VR applications.

title: Open Source Contributor - Unity XR Toolkit
description: Active contributor to Unity's official XR Interaction Toolkit, with merged pull requests improving accessibility features and performance optimizations used by thousands of developers worldwide.

title: Hackathon Winner - AI for Accessibility
description: Led team to develop ML-powered sign language translation in VR environments, enabling real-time communication for deaf and hard-of-hearing users in virtual spaces.

title: Published Research - Reducing VR Motion Sickness
description: Co-authored peer-reviewed paper presenting novel techniques for reducing simulator sickness in VR locomotion, cited by leading VR researchers and implemented in commercial applications.
